text: we had some breaking news to bring you

state television confirming that the
former Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak
has died he was 91 President Mubarak
ruled Egypt for three decades after
being forced from office during the
process that engulfed parts of the Arab
world in 2011 he was tried and found
guilty of complicity in the killing of
protesters during the uprising now that
conviction was overturned he was freed
in March 2017 so breaking news to bring

we are going to bring you more
